channel.title: [HELP] Problem with Ancients [HELP]
channel.description:
OK so I am trying to make PKing better in my server and people have been complaning that Ice spells don't give the effect, meaning people can still run once you cast, and people are getting annoyed about this. I am using Ddsspeced source just so you know. Don't tell me anything confusing, I could do with knowing what file to look in and what to search for and then what to change, this way it makes things so much more easy for me and I won't get confused and waste more of your time.
Thanks for any help you can give :)

item.title: [HELP] Problem with Ancients [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

OK I’ve searched it and found the following…

} public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) { if (spell == 12861) { return 10000; } if (spell == 12881) { return 20000; } if (spell == 12871) { return 30000; } if (spell == 12891) { return 40000; } if (spell == 1572) { return 10000; } if (spell == 1582) { return 20000; } if (spell == 1592) { return 30000; } return 30; }

} if (MagicHandler.itFreezes && !splash) { if (server.playerHandler.players[index].EntangleDelay <= 0) { server.playerHandler.players[index].lastEntangle = System.currentTimeMillis(); server.playerHandler.players[index].entangleDelay = getFreezeTimer(MagicHandler.spellID); mage.sM("You have been frozen!"); mage.toX = mage.absX; mage.toY = mage.absY; } }

So what do I need to change?

Read full topic
